page.title: 08WEEKLY VISITORS TO HOMES.
page.content: {DUSTMEN}Refuse collectors come on a Tuesday morning in a large dustcart. One man puts sacks or bins of rubbish by the side of the road.The other men throw the refuse into the back of the lorry where it is compressed.When they have cleared all the streets they go to the refuse tip at Princess Drive, Leamington and tip it out.Later it is taken to Smith's Landfill Site Bubbenhall.Some houses have a{POOLS {COLLECTOR}calling. He collects completed football coupons (i.e. betting on the results of football matches)and the money.This saves postage and cheque charges.If you get 8 draws correct you could win up to Â£lm.An{INSURANCE MAN}calls at some houses to collect insurance premiums on life policies.This is becoming less common as many more people have cheque accounts at banks.
